ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Stun/root
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I distinctly recall this not being the case early on because once in Cazic, I tried to Chain a green guard (stupid group wasn t all fighting the same
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 9 Mar 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> are you sure it's level-dependent? maybe in the 30s is when you fought some
> green stuff that ran earlier than we are used to. i don't think it has
> anything to do with level. i think simply anything chained that is running
> away will stop running at 50% health. they could be running because they

I distinctly recall this not being the case early on because
once in Cazic, I tried to Chain a green guard (stupid group
wasn't all fighting the same target), and he ended up getting
far enough away to aggro enough mobs to force us to zone. I
also used the chain/fear combo on Broon whenever I passed
through EK, and was somewhat surprised when he suddenly
stopped running at 50% as opposed to the 25% or so I'd grown
used to.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
